# AMOSKYS Dependencies
# This file is auto-generated from pyproject.toml for pip compatibility
# For development: pip install -e .[dev,web]
# For production: pip install -e .[web,agents]

# To regenerate this file: pip freeze > requirements.txt

# Installation:
# Core only:       pip install -e .
# With web:        pip install -e .[web]
# With agents:     pip install -e .[agents]
# Full dev setup:  pip install -e .[all]
